metadata.title: CVE-2023-34410 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Qt before 5.15.15, 6.x before 6.2.9, and 6.3.xthrough 6.5.x before 6.5.2. Certificate validation for TLS does not alwaysconsider whether the root of a chain is a configured CA certificate.

criterions.comment: qtbase-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
qtbase-opensource-src-gles package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
